subscription.recurring: At Yester is recurring subscription. If you decide to purchase a subscription, an initial payment will be charged to you iTunes account. Shortly before the end of each subscription period, your account will be charged. Auto-renewal may be disabled at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes store after purchase. For more information, please see our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
